markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blister Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1896)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Blister ammunition is loaded with alchemically processed irritants, such as pollen, pepper, and formic acid. A creature hit by activated blister ammunition must attempt a Fortitude save or begin to itch uncontrollably in addition to damage the attack normally deals. On a critical hit, increase the Fortitude DC by 2, and the target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round. For the duration, each time the target attempts a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) action, it must attempt a DC 8 flat check, losing the action on a failure. An affected creature can use a single Interact action to scratch and sneeze, allowing it to automatically pass the flat check. The effect ends early once an affected creature spends 3 Interact actions scratching and sneezing. These Interact actions don't need to be consecutive.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blister Ammunition (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 21 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The maximum duration is 3 rounds, and the Fortitude DC is 19.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blister Ammunition (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 210 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The maximum duration is 6 rounds, and the Fortitude DC is 28.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blister Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The maximum duration is 10 rounds, and the Fortitude DC is 35.
name: Blister Ammunition (Moderate)
